subject: Human Growth Hormone
Perjury
Jury System
Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The defense in Roger Clemens’s perjury trial asked the judge on Wednesday to bar Andy Pettitte from saying Brian McNamee, Clemens’s former trainer, gave him H.G.H.
snippet: The defense in Roger Clemens’s perjury trial asked the judge on Wednesday to bar Andy Pettitte from saying Brian McNamee, Clemens’s former trainer, gave him H.G.H.
